RPMs that we install

  1. VNC Server Installation Version 3.3.3r2-6
    1. Obtain the RPM from NIM server
      scp taitc118:/prod/images/RPMS/VNC/vnc-3.3.3r2-6.aix5.1.ppc.rpm /var/tmp
    2. Install the RPM
      rpm -i /var/tmp/vnc-3.3.3r2-6.aix5.1.ppc.rpm
    3. Cleanup the installation files
      rm /var/tmp/vnc-3.3.3r2-6.aix5.1.ppc.rpm
  2. rsync installation
    1. Obtain the RPM from NIM server
      scp taitc118:/prod/images/RPMS/rsync-3.0.6-1.aix5.3.ppc.rpm /var/tmp
    2. Install the RPM
      rpm -i /var/tmp/rsync-3.0.6-1.aix5.3.ppc.rpm
    3. Cleanup the installation files
      rm /var/tmp/rsync-3.0.6-1.aix5.3.ppc.rpm
  1. List files off of an rpm
    rpm -qpl <filename>.rpm
